abstractText: Suitable incubation and larval rearing habitat is critical for successful recruitment, and this habitat is limited in the post-Libby Dam spawning reach (Paragamian et al. 2002). To test hatching success over different substrates and in response to flow or physical habitat improvement measures, we sample for drifting larval sturgeon with D-ring and  meter nets.
title: Larval sturgeon sampling v1.0
